And buying the stock for nothing at 0.0008 will bring unbelievable profit. Buying 8million shares, Sell 8 million shares@ $1.00 = $8,000,000 With 2200% or more in gains, ATTD will turn around your losses and bring your trading account back positive. After purchase remember to Add ATTD to your Watchlist to maximize gains to the upside on more news and to buy more on news.
